                        java.lang.String password,
                        java.lang.String schoolName)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Inserts a student record while ensuring the foreign key constraint is met. It first inserts a new entity into the Entities table and retrieves the generated ID, then uses that ID as student_id when inserting into the Students table. Note: The method signature remains unchanged.

        java.lang.Exception
